materiaux:
Supplies
  • Hand Sanitiser
  • Water - 2 litres
  • Wind up Radio
  • Torch and Spare Batteries
  • Hat and Gloves
  • Chocolate and Biscuits
  • Blanket
  • Matches, Nightlights, Lighter
  • 24 hour self heat ration pack
  • Analogue Phone
  • Solar Charger
  • First Aid Kit
  • Cash
  • List of local Radio Stations
  • List of phone numbers
  • Basket

etapes.html:
1. Step 1: What If the Lights Went Out?

Étapes :

  1. What if the lights went out?
  2. Could you cope for 24 hours with no power? Electricity is always “on tap”, but, as has been seen in the North of England and Scotland recently, adverse weather can cause our supply to fail.
  3. I have put together a “Power Cut Kit” Hamper - with everything I would want if my power went off for 24 hours or longer.
  4. The contents were selected after reading the “Living Without Electricity” report https://lnkd.in/d3deXveP produced by the Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET), Lancaster University and Royal Academy of Engineering
  5. Cost, excluding cash - £130
